channel.title: Error adding npcs
channel.description:
[code]//------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption spawn = 2030 3556 3298 0 0 0 0 0 2 Verac_the_Defiled spawn = 2026 3575 3297 0 0 0 0 0 2 Dharok_the_Wretched spawn = 2027 3577 3283 0 0 0 0 0 2 Guthan_the_Infested spawn = 2028 3564 3289 0 0 0 0 0 2 Karil_the_Tainted spawn = 2029 3553 3282 0 0 0 0 0 2 Torag_the_Corrupted spawn = 2025 3565 3275 0 0 0 0 0 2 Ahrim_the_Blighted[/code]
when i add a npc like these, i keep getting errors, it compiles everything fine, but when i runsever it shows this: [IMG]http://img257.imageshack.us/img257/1190/autospawncfgerrorvi0.png[/img]
it allows me to log in but goes to black screen and then says connection lost..
how or what can i do to fix this
